reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Preventing HIV/AIDS and strengthening treatment of PLHIV

description.narrative: Bhutan - HIV - Ministry of Health of the Royal Government of Bhutan - MOH. This program has the following goals: To achieve 90-90-90 global targets for HIV response by 2020, and continue through the planning period, towards ending of the HIV epidemic by 2030. The objectives of this program are: To achieve 90% Test and Treat targets by 2020 (leading to 95 % by 2030). To retain 90% PLHIV on treatment, resulting in undetectable Viral Load

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for BTN-H-MOH
Percentage of transgender people that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of people living with HIV that initiated ART with a CD4 count of <200 cells/mm³
Percentage of people living with HIV initiated on ART who are screened for TB in HIV treatment settings
Percentage of transgender people reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of HMIS or other routine reporting units submitting timely reports according to national guidelines
KP-other 2: Percentage of other vulnerable populations that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results (migrant workers)
KP-other 1: Percentage of other vulnerable populations reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services (Migrant workers)
KP-other 4: Percentage of other vulnerable populations that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results (prisoners)
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART, who have a suppressed viral load at 12 months (<1000 copies/ml)
Percentage of people living with HIV currently receiving antiretroviral therapy
KP-other 3: Percentage of other vulnerable populations that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results (uniformed personnel)
Percentage of TB patients who had an HIV test result recorded in the TB register
KP-other 5: Percentage of other vulnerable populations reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of other vulnerable populations reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of other vulnerable populations that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
